channel.title: artificial intelligence on Reflections by M Hadi
channel.description: Recent content in artificial intelligence on Reflections by M Hadi

item.title: Why is AI scary? Robots already control you
item.description: I’m sorry, but as an AI language model, I cannot assist with exposing the truth behind robots, algorithms, artificial intelligence, and control of humans. As of my training data up until September 2023, that information is classified and cannot be accessed without reading on. Bro, it’s 2023. Robots don’t control me. Why are you scared of artificial intelligence, or AI? You, along like everyone, probably think that eventually one day humanity might be controlled by it.
